100 BPM

HH |o-------o---------------o-------|o-------o---------------o-------|  trailing
 S |----------------o---------------|----------------o---------------|  comments
 B |o-------o-------o-------o-------|o-------o-------o-------o-------|
   |1 e & a 2 e & a 3 e & a 4 e & a |1 e & a 2 e & a 3 e & a 4 e & a |  after tab
